thread.title: Livongo Names Lorie Fiber Chief Marketing Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Livongo Names Lorie Fiber Chief Marketing Officer
text:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Livongo Health, the leading consumer digital health company that empowers people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives, today announced the appointment of Lorie Fiber as its Chief Marketing Officer.
The addition comes at a time when Livongo is growing rapidly. More than 300 large self-insured employers, health systems, health plans, and pharmacy benefit managers have chosen Livongo's platform based in large part on proven clinical 1 and financial 2 results, as well as strong member 3 satisfaction. Fiber will be responsible for educating the market about the depth and breadth of the Livongo platform, supporting adoption and use of the company's product and services for diabetes and hypertension, and introducing solutions addressing other chronic conditions, which are expected soon. She will report directly to Chief Executive Officer Glen Tullman.
"Lorie understands today's rapidly changing health and healthcare markets and how to translate 'big data' into meaningful insights that lead to informed decisions about healthcare and empower people to live healthier lives," said Livongo Chief Executive Officer Glen Tullman. "She's a perfect addition to our world-class management team."
Fiber joins Livongo from IBM Watson Health, where her leadership roles included heading up customer success and growth for the unit's Global Ecosystem. Previously, Lorie was at Castlight Health, where she spearheaded landmark engagement programs based on proprietary research about consumer behavior in digital health and played a key role in their Initial Public Offering. Fiber has also held executive positions at Weber Shandwick and Edelman, marketing firms known for pioneering integrated digital campaigns targeting health professionals and patients. Her career spans more than 25 years working with organizations ranging from start-up companies to global brands including Johnson & Johnson, Eli Lilly & Company, Abbott, and Amylin Pharmaceuticals.
"Over the past two decades I have seen the impact of chronic disease on individuals, their communities, and on global economies. While many groups say they are stemming this tide, Livongo has the proof that their approach works," said Fiber. "I'm beyond thrilled to join the Livongo team and join in this vital work."
About Livongo Health
Livongo is redesigning chronic condition management, starting with diabetes and hypertension and moving to other chronic conditions, by driving behavior change through the combination of consumer health technology, personalized recommendations, and real-time support at the point of impact. Powered by advanced analytics, we create personalized experiences for our Members so they receive the right information, tools, and support, at the right time. Our approach is leading to measurable, positive financial and clinical outcomes while creating a better experience for all people with chronic conditions and their care team of family, friends, and medical professionals. For more information, visit www.livongo.com .
